name: Swipe Arrows
description:
Swipe Arrows by Gossh.

Swipe the arrows in the same direction, the yellow arrows in the opposite direction.

Sounds easy, right?


-------------------------------

Swipe Arrows features:

Easy and fun to play
Addictive and impossible
Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!

-------------------------------
